tasks.task: Design and develop a sustainable agricultural system called Polydome.
subtasks: Identify and address problems with current agro-industrial food production.
Create databases on over 400 agricultural products.
Develop a process for designing productive greenhouse ecosystems.
Co-locate crops and animals based on resource preferences.
Layer hydroponic and soil-based crop production.
Plan internal logistics systems for harvest and processing.
Benefit from material flows between products.
Produce high-value niche products for local sale.
Improve livelihoods of workers, farmers, and local consumers.
Develop partnerships to build a Polydome pilot.

tasks.task: Promote and advocate for Polydome's vision of sustainable agriculture.
subtasks: Share the research results through a free, open-source document.
Encourage engagement and collaboration from like-minded individuals.
Provide website contact information for further inquiry.
